useCase.name: Manage Inventory
useCase.description: Manage the inventory by updating item details.

preconditions.precondition: Manager has access to the inventory management system.

successEndConditions.condition: Item details successfully updated in the database.

useCase.trigger: Manager selects an item to update in the inventory.

mainSequence.step: Manager accesses the inventory management system.
Manager selects an item to update.
Backend service updates the item in the database and confirms success to Manager.
